summary: This document appears to be a financial record or invoice listing for water treatment and cooling tower maintenance services performed at a property referred to as 'Epstein Tower' between 2016 and 2018. It details monthly and quarterly maintenance, inspections, and legionella testing.

events.title: Epstein Tower Cooling Tower Cleaning
events.description: Cleaning and disinfection service performed on the cooling tower at Epstein Tower.

events.title: Legionella Test at Cooling Tower
events.description: Legionella testing and 90-day tower inspection performed.

keyFacts: The document lists recurring water treatment and maintenance services for a cooling tower at 'Epstein Tower' from 2016 to 2018.
Services included monthly maintenance, cleaning, disinfection, and specific testing for legionella bacteria.
The records suggest consistent property upkeep at a location associated with Jeffrey Epstein.
